abstract: Gov Lehman sees peace hope in Roosevelt's appeal to religious leaders
snippet: Governor Lehman, in a New Year's greeting to the people of the State, last night predicted that President Roosevelt's appeal to religious leaders to join him in an attempt to restore peace to "a sick world" would have far-reaching effects here and...

headline.main: LEHMAN FINDS HOPE IN ROOSEVELT PLEA; New Year's Greeting to State Predicts Effects of Peace Appeal Will Reach Far SAYS ALL FAITHS WILL AID U.S. Must Safeguard Security and Not Take Liberty for Granted, Governor Says

lead_paragraph: Governor Lehman, in a New Year's greeting to the people of the State, last night predicted that President Roosevelt's appeal to religious leaders to join him in an attempt to restore peace to "a sick world" would have far-reaching effects here and abroad.
